name: Slate
text:
RT @saletan: Stop saying "Defund the police." It's a bad way of conveying ideas that voters would endorse if you framed them better.

How much support would you gain for police reform and social services if you switched to positive language? According to polls: a lot. https://t.co/0QIPAZMRAz
